issue.title: [R] write_csv_arrow should follow the signature of readr::write_csv
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13623](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13623). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Map the arguments to our WriteOptions and error on unsupported options. Make the defaults match. Also make Jiras if needed for missing CSV write options in the C++ library. 

I noticed we had a difference in quoting: readr doesn't quote strings by default but we do.
